mapper.insert: INSERT INTO kcxx ( kcname, kcnum, badnum, nullnum, jkname, kcno ) VALUES (#{kcname},#{kcnum},#{badnum},#{nullnum},#{jkname},#{kcno})
mapper.select: SELECT kcname, kcnum, jkname, kcno FROM kcxx WHERE <where> <if test="kcname!=null and kcname!=''" > and kcname like concat('%',#kcname,'%') </if> <if test="jkname!=null and jkname=''"> and jkname like concat('%',#jkname,'%') </if> <if test="kcno!=null and kcno=''"> and kcno like concat('%',#kcno,'%') </if> </where>
